topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d07f6a63687255a38d0100#post_53d07f6a63687255a38d0100
[bq="QuasarNova"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d07f436368725753eb0100#post_53d07f436368725753eb0100

Like the porn magazines in MG games?[/bq]
It's funny cause it works in multiple games.  In Garry's mod's trouble in terrorist town it's a good way to get everyone in the same area for a incendiary grenade or jihad bomb.  I've actually managed to take out everyone several times with a well placed jihad in TTT due to porn sprays.

I wonder how many people have seen their first porn picture cause of someone baiting them in video games?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
